name: Joint Together - Don't Do Drugs Kids
name_original: Joint Together - Don't Do Drugs Kids
description:
Do you like to have fun? Then look elsewhere, as this is a game full of pain suffering and the occasional blunt. Navigate around a rather badly designed course of obstacles whilst exponentially struggling to see or move. And remember Don't Do Drugs Kids!

Controls:
W, A, S, D - move

Hold and Release SPACE - jump
Hold LEFT SHIFT - pick yourself up 

PS - you can jump to move while on the floor 

Made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam
